original_text:
let his flesh become fresh with youth;
    let him return to the days of his youthful vigor’;
korean_text: 그런즉 그의 살이 청년보다 부드러워지며 젊음을 회복하리라

sentences.original_text: let his flesh become fresh with youth;
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 육체가 젊어서 싱싱하게 되게 하라;

sentences.original_text: let him return to the days of his youthful vigor’;
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 젊었을 때의 그 날들로 돌아가게 하라';
